question: Where is the Nandankanan Zoological Park located?
explanation:
The Nandankanan Zoological Park (NZP) is located in Bhubaneswar. The NZP has revived ‘Adopt-An-Animal’ programme, since it has suffered a huge loss following its closure due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
The NZP is an important zoo in the country in terms of its species diversity. Since launch, the zoo has received more than 100 applications from animal lovers for amount of Rs.22 lakh.
